TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EventHandler(object sender, EventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed EventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EventHandler(sender As Object, e As EventArgs)
public delegate void EventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, EventArgs ^ e);
type EventHandler = delegate of obj * EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 不包含事件数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains no event data.

summary.span: 表示将用于处理不具有事件数据的事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle an event that has no event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 中的事件模型基于具有其处理程序与连接事件的事件委托。The event model in the .NET Framework is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler. 若要引发事件，需要两个元素：To raise an event, two elements are needed: - 提供对事件作出响应的标识的方法的委托。A delegate that identifies the method that provides the response to the event. - （可选） 一个类，包含事件数据，如果事件提供数据。Optionally, a class that holds the event data, if the event provides data. 委托是一种定义一个签名，也就是说，返回值类型和方法的参数列表类型。The delegate is a type that defines a signature, that is, the return value type and parameter list types for a method. 可以使用的委托类型来声明变量可以引用具有相同的签名与委托的任何方法。You can use the delegate type to declare a variable that can refer to any method with the same signature as the delegate. 事件处理程序委托的标准签名定义不返回值的方法。The standard signature of an event handler delegate defines a method that does not return a value. 此方法的第一个参数的类型是和引用引发事件的实例。This method's first parameter is of type and refers to the instance that raises the event. 第二个参数从类型派生和保存事件数据。Its second parameter is derived from type and holds the event data. 如果该事件不会生成事件数据，第二个参数是只需值字段。If the event does not generate event data, the second parameter is simply the value of the field. 否则，第二个参数是派生自类型和提供的任何字段或保存事件数据所需的属性。Otherwise, the second parameter is a type derived from and supplies any fields or properties needed to hold the event data. 委托是一个预定义的委托，专用于表示事件处理程序方法不会生成数据的事件。The delegate is a predefined delegate that specifically represents an event handler method for an event that does not generate data. 如果事件生成数据，则必须使用泛型委托类。If your event does generate data, you must use the generic delegate class. 若要将事件与将处理的事件的方法相关联，添加到事件的委托的实例。To associate the event with the method that will handle the event, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示名为的事件`ThresholdReached`相关联委托。The following example shows an event named `ThresholdReached` that is associated with an delegate. 分配给该方法调用委托`OnThresholdReached`方法。The method assigned to the delegate is called in the `OnThresholdReached` method. [!code-cpp[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/cpp/programwithdata.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/cs/programwithdata.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/vb/module1withdata.vb#6)]
